name: Pac-Rat
description:
"PACRAT" is written in Micro Color Basic on my favourite 8-bit computer, and the first computer I ever owned, the TRS-80 Micro Color Computer or MC-10.  Some call it the "Poco" because it is the little brother to the Tandy Color Computer.  It's a budget 8-bit micro along the lines of the Sinclair ZX-81.

The game can be played at my website using Mike Tinnes' TRS-80 MC-10 Emulator. Just select PACRAT from the cassette menu, and then type RUN in the main screen and hit .

Source Code: https://github.com/jggames/trs80mc10/blob/master/quicktype/APF_Imagination_Machi...

Blog posting: http://jimgerrie.blogspot.com/2021/06/pac-rat-10-liner-game-for-itchiio-game.htm...
